lines.text:
[Hands on Amy's face]
You are so beautiful. So sexy!
[kisses her]

[thrilled]
I am not.
Oh, you don't even know it; that makes you all the more!
[kisses her again and hugs her]
Agh, come here, come here, come here,
[mumbles]
come here.
[brings her down to sit near fireplace and kisses her again]

[realization]
Oh, no.

[looks out window slightly disinterested]
What?
I have to be home by 10. My mom, you know. But this Saturday, I can stay over and I can say I'm at Dana's.

[caresses her head]
I'm not free most weekends. Pro bono case. I don't think I can get away 'til next Tuesday.

[laughs in happy disbelief]
So I have to wait five whole days to see you again?
I'll be thinking of you the whole time.
[kisses her]
Which reminds me.
[dangles keys in front of her face]
So you know that I'm not bringing anybody else here. And feel free to bring your friends anytime you want, okay?
[caresses face]

[smiles]
You are so sweet, you know that?

[smiles; slightly nods]
Yes, I do.
[chuckles a bit and proceeds to start making out with Amy while a shaky camera shot from the window indicates someone is watching ]
